page.title: 16Industrial Estate Bracknell
page.content: {The Southern Industrial Estate}in {Bracknell}is quite large. It has many varied industries including large companies like International Computers Ltd.(ICL),Daler Rowney,Baverian Motor Works(BMW),Lovaux,Technical Indexes, Waitrose and small companies like Roy Bishop Precision,Glentworth Precision Engineering. This estate contains mostly light industry and it is one of three such estates in Bracknell. The other two are the Western and Eastern Industrial areas.A wide variety of things are made and sold there - computers,cars, aircraft parts,paints and things like those. The areas in and around all three estates are landscaped with trees and grassy banks,close to some of the main housing estates,railway and two motorways.
